snippet.title: Something In The Mist
snippet.description:
Something in The Mist Game

"After an eerie mist rolls into a small town, the residents must battle the mysterious mist and its threats, fighting to maintain their morality and sanity."

The game inspired by the “The Mist” tale places you in a role of a soldier in charge of kill every monster around the streets. This is the released version for the Darktober 2007 GameJam with a theme (Ghost Stories) Make a story-based game with a dark theme.

Thank you all.

Game Developer
Game Designer

Erasmo Soares (Spitzer Games)
- Recife, Brazil

Daniel Kim (DanKimAudio) - Composer
 - Long Beach, California

Daniel Ramos - Sound Designer
 - Long Beach, California

Assets

Toon Soldiers
Polygon Blacksmith

Skeleton Swordsman
BitGem

Simple Town
Synty Studios
